name: By far the WORST rage game ever DEMO
name_original: By far the WORST rage game ever DEMO
description:
BFTWRGE is a simplistic game. It was made in under 2 hours and it's supposed to be a rage game. It's so bad that it's what it wasn't supposed to be: hard. Remember that this is a demo, so the game might have some bugs and might be short for some people.

Ever wondered to be a square that needs to avoid red lines because if he doesn't he goes all back to the end? Well, now you can! Screw that "Getting Over It", do not even think about Sam Hogan's "Stick With It"!

If you need to play on mobile, you'll need a controller or a keyboard.

Open this link! 

Hope you'll enjoy this game!
